_source.text: 1871, besides encores in the northern towns, brought the return of the Requiem to Vienna; reviews were certainly better than for the premiere four years earlier, but still fairly cool and reserved.

text: were certainly **better** **than** for the premiere four years earlier, but still fairly cool and reserved.
1871, besides encores in the northern towns, brought the return of the **Requiem** to Vienna; reviews

_source.text: 3. I can see how the triple mode of operation may be better than the five-level (multi-mode) mainly due to the mechanics of dimming the light.

text: 3. I can see how the triple **mode** of operation may be **better** **than** the five-level (multi-**mode**) mainly due to the mechanics of dimming **the** **light**.
